thread.title: Daniele Michele
thread.title_full: tripsta.it recensione scritta da Daniele Michele

author: Daniele Michele
title: Daniele Michele
text:
I trusted based on other reviews for an expensive purchase (Milan - Singapore for 6 people, worth more than 5k euros!.
So far just booking, but seems already enough in this case to express an opinion: very easy site; all information about the flight very clear and always repeated through the process; no change in prices over the process / depending on the payment mean! no hidden costs, easy description and fair prices of options (e.g. travel insurance), fast payment without issues or interruptions.
A safe harbor...definitively recommended
